metadata.titleCn: 祁连山综合观测网：黑河流域地表过程综合观测网（黑河遥感站自动气象站-2021）
metadata.description:
This dataset includes data recorded by the Heihe integrated observatory network obtained from the automatic weather station (AWS) at the observation system of Heihe remote sensing station from January 1 to December 31, 2021. The site (100.4756° E, 38.8270° N) was located on artificial grassland in Dangzhai Town of Zhangye, Gansu Province. The elevation is 1560 m. The installation heights and orientations of different sensors and measured quantities were as follows: air temperature and humidity profile (1.5 m, north), wind speed and direction (10 m, north), air pressure (2 m), rain gauge (0.7 m), four-component radiometer (1.5 m, south), two infrared temperature sensors (1.5 m, south, vertically downward), soil heat flux (3 duplicates, -0.06 m), soil temperature profile (0, -0.02, -0.04, -0.1, -0.2, -0.4, -0.8, -1.2, -1.6 m), soil moisture profile (-0.02, -0.04, -0.1, -0.2, -0.4, -0.8, -1.2, -1.6 m), and two photosynthetically active radiation (1.5 m, south, one vertically downward and one vertically upward).
The observations included the following: air temperature and humidity (Ta_1.5, RH_1.5 m) (℃ and %, respectively), wind speed (Ws_10 m) (m/s), wind direction (WD_10 m) (°), air pressure (press) (hpa), precipitation (rain) (mm), four-component radiation (DR, incoming shortwave radiation; UR, outgoing shortwave radiation; DLR_Cor, incoming longwave radiation; ULR_Cor, outgoing longwave radiation; Rn, net radiation) (W/m^2), infrared temperature (IRT_1 and IRT_2) (℃), soil heat flux (Gs_1, Gs_2, and Gs_3) (W/m^2), soil temperature (Ts_0 cm, Ts_2 cm, Ts_4 cm, Ts_10 cm, Ts_20 cm, Ts_40 cm, Ts_80 cm, Ts_120 cm, Ts_160 cm) (℃), soil moisture (Ms_2 cm, Ms_4 cm, Ms_10 cm, Ms_20 cm, Ms_40 cm, Ms_80 cm, Ms_120 cm, Ms_160 cm) (℃),on the plants photosynthetically active radiation of upward and downward (PAR_U_up and PAR_U_down) (μmol/ (s m^-2)). Due to the power loss, data during August 20 to October 9 were missing. Due to the sensor malfunction, the air temperature and relative humidity data were missing during January 1 to 22.
The data processing and quality control steps were as follows: (1) The AWS data were averaged over intervals of 10 min for a total of 144 records per day. The missing data were denoted by -6999. (2) Data in duplicate records were rejected. (3) Unphysical data were rejected. (4) The data marked in red are problematic data. (5) The format of the date and time was unified, and the date and time were collected in the same column, for example, date and time: 2021-6-10 10:30. (6) Finally, the naming convention was AWS+ site no. Moreover, suspicious data were marked in red.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2021年1月1日至2021年12月31日黑河流域地表过程综合观测网中游黑河遥感站气象要素观测数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市党寨镇东侧，下垫面是人工草地。观测点的经纬度是100.4756E, 38.8270N，海拔1560m。空气温度湿度传感器架设在1.5m处，朝向正北；气压计在防水箱内；翻斗式雨量计安装在0.7 m处；风速风向传感器架设在10m处，朝向正北；四分量辐射仪安装高度为1.5m，朝向正南；两个红外温度计安装高度为1.5m，朝向正南，探头朝向是垂直向下；土壤温度探头埋设在地表0cm和地下2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm、160cm处；土壤水分探头埋设在2cm、4cm、10cm、20cm、40cm、80cm、120cm、160cm处；平均土壤温度探头埋设在2cm和4cm；土壤热流板（3块）依次埋设在地下6cm处；两个光合有效辐射仪分别架设在冠层上方1.5m（探头垂直向上和向下方向各一个），朝向正南。
观测项目有：空气温湿度（Ta_1.5m、RH_1.5m）(单位：摄氏度、百分比)、气压（Press）(单位：百帕)、降水量（Rain）(单位：毫米)、风速（WS_10m）(单位：米/秒)、风向（WD_10m）(单位：度)、四分量辐射（DR、UR、DLR_Cor、ULR_Cor、Rn）(单位：瓦/平方米)、地表辐射温度（IRT_1、IRT_2）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤热通量（Gs_1、Gs_2、Gs_3）(单位：瓦/平方米)、土壤温度（Ts_0cm、Ts_2cm、Ts_4cm、Ts_10cm、Ts_20cm、Ts_40cm、Ts_80cm、Ts_120cm、Ts_160cm）(单位：摄氏度)、土壤水分（Ms_2cm、Ms_4cm、Ms_10cm、Ms_20cm、Ms_40cm、Ms_80cm、Ms_120cm、Ms_160cm）(单位：%)、向上与向下光合有效辐射（PAR_U_up、PAR_U_down）(单位：微摩尔/平方米秒)、平均土壤温度（TCAV）（单位：摄氏度）。由于供电问题，8月20日-10月9日数据缺失；由于传感器问题，1月1日-1月22日数据缺失。
观测数据的处理与质量控制：（1）确保每天144个数据（每10min），若出现数据的缺失，则由-6999标示；（2）剔除有重复记录的时刻；（3）删除了明显超出物理意义或超出仪器量程的数据；（4）数据中以红字标示的部分为有疑问的数据；（5）日期和时间的格式统一，并且日期、时间在同一列。如，时间为：2021-6-10 10:30；（6）命名规则为：AWS+站点名称
黑河综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是其经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持了中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域被先前研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展具有重要意义。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频发，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013），咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集，涵盖了2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，以及风速和风向的梯度；空气压力、降水和土壤湿度剖面）通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期进行观测，同时还记录了地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括HRB的中下游，位于中国西部的干旱地区，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了共11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to observe energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于观察绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: One example of a data collection method involves the use of an eddy covariance system and scintillometer to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data, along with automatic weather stations that record hydrometeorological data such as radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, and gradients of air temperature and humidity with a 10-minute average period.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法涉及使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取半小时的湍流通量数据，以及自动气象站记录水文气象数据，如辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面，以及空气温度和湿度的梯度，平均周期为10分钟。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in data collection for understanding oasis–desert interactions in arid regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区理解绿洲与沙漠相互作用的数据收集中面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge in data collection is the ecological environment degradation such as drying up of rivers and lakes, vegetation degradation, and land desertification in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas, which complicates long-term monitoring and data collection efforts.
Example.AnswerCn: 数据收集面临的一个挑战是生态环境退化，例如河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化以及干旱和半干旱地区内陆河流流域的土地沙漠化，这使得长期监测和数据收集工作变得复杂。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What attributes define the quality control processes for meteorological data in comprehensive observation networks?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 定义综合观测网络气象数据质量控制过程的属性有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: data completeness, placeholder for missing data, removal of duplicate timestamps, deletion of data exceeding limits, marking questionable data, standardized date and time formats, specific naming rules for data files
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 数据完整性，缺失数据的占位符，删除重复的时间戳，删除超出限制的数据，标记可疑数据，标准化日期和时间格式，数据文件的特定命名规则。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many observation stations are included in a dataset covering the middle and lower reaches of an inland river basin?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 该数据集中包含多少个观测站，覆盖内陆河流域的中下游区域？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the frequency of data collection for hydrometeorological parameters in a typical dataset from an oasis–desert system?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在典型的绿洲-沙漠系统数据集中，水文气象参数的数据收集频率是多少？
Quantification.AnswerCn: 很抱歉，我需要更多的上下文来准确翻译“上述信息”。请提供具体的文本内容。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'eddy covariance system' mean in the context of data collection methods for oasis–desert ecosystems?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统的数据收集方法中，“涡度协方差系统”指的是一种用于测量气体交换（如二氧化碳和水蒸气）的方法，通过分析气流的涡度和浓度变化来评估生态系统的碳和水循环。
Definition.AnswerEn: An eddy covariance system is a data collection method used to measure turbulent fluxes of energy, water vapor, and gases such as carbon dioxide and methane in oasis–desert ecosystems. It involves high-frequency measurements of wind speed and gas concentration to calculate vertical fluxes, providing half-hourly data on ecosystem exchanges.
Definition.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统是一种数据收集方法，用于测量绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气以及二氧化碳和甲烷等气体的湍流通量。它涉及对风速和气体浓度的高频测量，以计算垂直通量，提供关于生态系统交换的半小时数据。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'scintillometer' in the context of measuring fluxes in oasis–desert areas?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在测量绿洲-沙漠地区的通量时，“闪烁计”是指一种用于测量光通量的仪器。
Definition.AnswerEn: A scintillometer is an instrument used in the context of measuring fluxes in oasis–desert areas to observe the turbulent fluxes over longer distances by measuring the refractive index of air. It complements eddy covariance systems in providing data on heat and mass transfer in the atmosphere.
Definition.AnswerCn: 闪烁仪是一种用于测量绿洲-沙漠地区通量的仪器，通过测量空气的折射率来观察较长距离的湍流通量。它补充了涡度协方差系统，为大气中的热量和物质传输提供数据。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection techniques for meteorological elements in oasis–desert areas compare to those used in the artificial grassland settings of the Heihe River Basin?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠地区的气象元素数据收集技术与黑河流域人工草地环境中使用的技术相比，如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both settings utilize automatic weather stations for data collection, with observations made at regular intervals (e.g., 10 minutes in Heihe River Basin and half-hourly in oasis–desert areas). The Heihe River Basin focuses specifically on meteorological elements like air temperature, humidity, and soil parameters, whereas oasis–desert areas additionally measure energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 两个设置都利用自动气象站进行数据收集，观察在固定时间间隔内进行（例如，黑河流域每10分钟一次，绿洲-沙漠地区每半小时一次）。黑河流域专注于气象要素，如空气温度、湿度和土壤参数，而绿洲-沙漠地区则额外测量能量、水蒸气和碳通量，使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences in challenges faced by inland river basins and oasis–desert systems in terms of ecological environment degradation?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 内陆河流流域和绿洲-沙漠系统在生态环境退化方面面临的挑战有哪些相似之处和不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both inland river basins and oasis–desert systems face challenges such as drying rivers, land desertification, and vegetation degradation. However, inland river basins like the Tarim River basin and others along the Silk Road specifically face issues such as the drying up of lakes and frequent dust storms, which may not be as emphasized in oasis–desert systems.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 内陆河流域和绿洲–沙漠系统都面临着干涸河流、土地沙漠化和植被退化等挑战。然而，像塔里木河流域这样的内陆河流域，特别是在丝绸之路沿线，面临着湖泊干涸和频繁的沙尘暴等问题，这些问题在绿洲–沙漠系统中可能没有得到同样的强调。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the approach to handling data quality control in the Heihe River Basin compare to that in oasis–desert observation datasets?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在黑河流域的数据质量控制处理方法与绿洲-沙漠观测数据集相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: In the Heihe River Basin, data quality control involves marking missing data with specific codes, removing duplicate records, and ensuring consistent formatting of date and time. Oasis–desert datasets also emphasize data processing and quality control through data collection, processing, archiving, and sharing, involving detailed checks for various hydrometeorological and flux-related observations.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在黑河流域，数据质量控制涉及用特定代码标记缺失数据、删除重复记录以及确保日期和时间的一致格式。绿洲-沙漠数据集同样强调数据处理和质量控制，通过数据收集、处理、归档和共享，进行各种水文气象和通量相关观测的详细检查。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What methods could be employed to ensure continuous data collection in remote meteorological stations despite power supply issues?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 为了确保远程气象站在电力供应问题下能够持续收集数据，可以采用以下方法：
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The dataset notes a gap in data collection due to power supply issues from August 20 to October 9. Ensuring continuous data collection could involve using alternative power sources such as solar panels, backup generators, or energy storage systems to maintain the operation of the automatic weather stations.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据集指出，由于电力供应问题，从8月20日到10月9日的数据收集存在间隙。确保持续的数据收集可以考虑使用替代电源，如太阳能电池板、备用发电机或储能系统，以维持自动气象站的运行。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of different data collection methods enhance the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 不同数据收集方法的整合如何增强对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的理解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The metadata indicates the use of various sensors for observing meteorological and soil parameters. By integrating methods such as eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, and automatic weather stations, researchers can obtain a comprehensive dataset that captures multiple aspects of the ecosystem, thus providing a more holistic understanding of the interactions between energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis–desert areas.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 元数据表明使用了各种传感器来观察气象和土壤参数。通过整合涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪和自动气象站等方法，研究人员可以获得一个全面的数据集，捕捉生态系统的多个方面，从而提供对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换相互作用的更全面理解。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in maintaining the accuracy and reliability of data collected from semi-arid regions, and how might they be addressed?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在维护从半干旱地区收集的数据的准确性和可靠性方面，可能面临的挑战有哪些，以及如何应对这些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges include data gaps due to environmental conditions, sensor malfunctions, and physical limitations of instruments. Addressing these could involve regular maintenance and calibration of sensors, implementing data validation and correction techniques, and using redundant systems to cross-verify data for accuracy and reliability.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括由于环境条件、传感器故障和仪器的物理限制导致的数据缺口。解决这些问题可以涉及定期维护和校准传感器、实施数据验证和修正技术，以及使用冗余系统交叉验证数据的准确性和可靠性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes gaps or missing values in meteorological data collected from automatic weather stations in arid and semi-arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致干旱和半干旱地区自动气象站收集的气象数据出现缺口或缺失值的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: In the field described, gaps or missing values in meteorological data can be caused by power supply issues, as evidenced by the data missing from August 20 to October 9, and by sensor malfunctions, as indicated by the data missing from January 1 to January 22.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在气象数据领域，数据中的缺口或缺失值可能是由于电源问题造成的，例如从8月20日到10月9日的数据缺失，以及由于传感器故障造成的缺失值，例如从1月1日到1月22日的数据缺失。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it critical to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems for sustainable development in arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于可持续发展至关重要。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Maintaining balance between oasis and desert systems is critical to support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis, as understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in these ecosystems is crucial to achieving goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展至关重要，因为理解这些生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征对于实现碳达峰和碳中和的目标至关重要。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the primary factors contributing to the degradation of the ecological environment in inland river basins of arid and semi-arid areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 导致干旱和半干旱地区内陆河流流域生态环境退化的主要因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in these areas face ecological degradation due to factors like the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域面临生态退化，原因包括河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences on data accuracy when implementing a 10-minute average period for hydrometeorological data collection in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中实施10分钟平均周期进行水文气象数据收集时，数据准确性可能面临的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The adoption of a 10-minute average period for hydrometeorological data collection may lead to the efficient capture of short-term variations in environmental conditions, providing a detailed temporal resolution that helps in understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert ecosystems. However, it might also introduce challenges in detecting rapid transient phenomena or outliers unless effectively managed by data processing and quality control procedures.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 采用10分钟的平均周期进行水文气象数据收集可能会有效捕捉环境条件的短期变化，提供详细的时间分辨率，有助于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征。然而，这也可能在检测快速瞬态现象或异常值时引入挑战，除非通过有效的数据处理和质量控制程序进行管理。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the use of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers impact the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪的使用如何影响对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的理解？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers allows for the precise acquisition of half-hourly turbulent flux data, which is critical for a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis-desert ecosystems. This methodology contributes significantly to recognizing oasis-desert interactions and supports the goals of sustainable development by ensuring accurate and comprehensive data collection.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪可以精确获取半小时的湍流通量数据，这对于定量理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换至关重要。这种方法显著有助于识别绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用，并支持可持续发展的目标，通过确保准确和全面的数据收集。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What could be the implications of having missing data due to power supply and sensor issues on the long-term monitoring of oasis-desert ecosystems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 由于电力供应和传感器问题导致缺失数据，对绿洲-沙漠生态系统的长期监测可能会产生以下影响：
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Missing data due to power supply and sensor issues can create gaps in the dataset, which may limit the ability to conduct continuous and reliable long-term monitoring of oasis-desert ecosystems. This can affect the analysis of trends and the understanding of ecosystem dynamics, potentially hindering efforts to maintain ecological stability and achieve sustainable development goals. Effective data processing and quality control measures are necessary to mitigate these gaps and ensure data integrity.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 由于电源和传感器问题导致的数据缺失可能会在数据集中造成空白，这可能限制对绿洲-沙漠生态系统进行持续和可靠的长期监测的能力。这会影响趋势分析和生态系统动态的理解，可能妨碍维持生态稳定和实现可持续发展目标的努力。有效的数据处理和质量控制措施是必要的，以减轻这些空白并确保数据的完整性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to collect long-term observational datasets in oasis–desert systems for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中收集长期观测数据集对于理解能量、水蒸气和碳交换的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用至关重要，并且对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives of integrating hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil parameters with carbon and methane flux measurements in oasis–desert systems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，整合水文气象、植被和土壤参数与碳和甲烷通量测量的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展至关重要。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to establish multiple land surface flux and meteorological stations in arid regions for data collection?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区建立多个地表通量和气象站进行数据收集是必要的，原因如下：
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 研究区域包括HRB的中下游，位于中国西部的干旱地区，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了共11个地表通量和气象站，其中包括2个超级站和9个普通站。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in ensuring the quality and accuracy of data collected from automatic weather stations in arid and semiarid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 确保从干旱和半干旱地区的自动气象站收集的数据质量和准确性涉及哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The data processing and quality control procedures include ensuring that there are 144 data entries per day, removing duplicate records, deleting data that exceed physical or instrument limits, marking questionable data with red, and standardizing date and time formats.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序包括确保每天有144条数据记录，删除重复记录，删除超过物理或仪器限制的数据，将可疑数据标记为红色，以及标准化日期和时间格式。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are hydrometeorological data, such as radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles, collected and integrated for comprehensive analysis in oasis-desert systems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 水文气象数据，如辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面，是如何收集和整合以便在绿洲-沙漠系统中进行综合分析的？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Hydrometeorological data are collected using automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period, including data on radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, air temperature, humidity gradients, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 水文气象数据通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期收集，包括辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、气温、湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水量以及土壤湿度剖面等数据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the steps taken to compile and share observational datasets of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis-desert ecosystems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 编译和共享绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的观测数据集的步骤包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The process involves data collection from multiple stations, data processing to ensure quality and remove errors, and data archiving and sharing, with datasets made freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该过程涉及从多个站点收集数据，进行数据处理以确保质量并消除错误，以及数据归档和共享，数据集由国家西藏高原数据中心免费提供。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do data processing and quality control procedures enhance the reliability of datasets in oasis-desert areas?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序如何增强沙漠地区数据集的可靠性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Data processing and quality control procedures enhance the reliability by ensuring the removal of duplicate records, deletion of data that exceed physical meaning or instrument range, and marking questionable data, along with ensuring consistent formatting of date and time.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序通过确保删除重复记录、删除超出物理意义或仪器范围的数据、标记可疑数据，以及确保日期和时间的一致格式，从而增强了可靠性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might data collection methods for oasis–desert systems require long-term observations to understand energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么对绿洲-沙漠系统的数据收集方法需要长期观察，以了解能量、水蒸气和碳交换？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Long-term observations are indispensable to achieve a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas. This is crucial for recognizing oasis–desert interactions, protecting ecological stability, and supporting the socioeconomic development of oases.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 长期观测对于实现对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解至关重要。这对于认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用、保护生态稳定性以及支持绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in maintaining data accuracy and consistency in datasets from inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域中，维护数据准确性和一致性可能会面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas face the risk of ecological degradation, including the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These challenges can impact data accuracy and consistency in environmental datasets.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态退化的风险，包括河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些挑战可能会影响环境数据集的数据准确性和一致性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to integrate hydrometeorological data with vegetation and soil parameters in datasets for oasis–desert research?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠研究中，将水文气象数据与植被和土壤参数集成是必要的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Integrating hydrometeorological data with vegetation and soil parameters is necessary because these comprehensive datasets support the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange processes in oasis–desert systems, which are essential for sustainable development and ecological security in arid regions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 整合水文气象数据与植被和土壤参数是必要的，因为这些综合数据集支持对绿洲-沙漠系统中能量、水汽和碳交换过程的理解，这对于干旱地区的可持续发展和生态安全至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you evaluate the effectiveness of data processing and quality control procedures in ensuring the integrity of data collected from automatic weather stations in arid regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估数据处理和质量控制程序在确保来自干旱地区自动气象站收集的数据完整性方面的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The data processing and quality control procedures involve several steps such as ensuring a set number of data entries per day, marking missing data with specific indicators, removing duplicates, and deleting data that surpasses physical or instrumental limits. These steps collectively contribute to maintaining data integrity, but challenges may still arise due to equipment malfunctions or environmental factors, as indicated by the noted data gaps due to power supply and sensor issues.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序涉及多个步骤，例如确保每天有一定数量的数据条目、用特定指示符标记缺失数据、删除重复数据以及删除超过物理或仪器限制的数据。这些步骤共同有助于维护数据的完整性，但由于设备故障或环境因素，仍可能出现挑战，正如所提到的由于电源供应和传感器问题导致的数据缺口所示。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the primary challenges in maintaining long-term observational datasets in arid and semiarid ecosystems, particularly in the context of oasis–desert systems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱生态系统中，特别是在绿洲-沙漠系统的背景下，维护长期观测数据集的主要挑战是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The primary challenges in maintaining long-term observational datasets in arid and semiarid ecosystems include the degradation of ecological environments such as drying rivers and lakes, increased desertification, and frequent dust storms. These environmental challenges, alongside technical issues like power supply failures and sensor problems, complicate the consistent collection and quality of long-term datasets.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱生态系统中，维护长期观测数据集的主要挑战包括生态环境的退化，如河流和湖泊干涸、沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些环境挑战，加上电力供应故障和传感器问题等技术问题， complicate 了长期数据集的一致收集和质量。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the challenges in maintaining consistent data collection in arid regions, especially given the environmental and logistical constraints.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对在干旱地区维持一致的数据收集面临的挑战感到不确定，尤其是考虑到环境和后勤方面的限制。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Challenges in maintaining consistent data collection include issues like power supply problems and sensor malfunctions, which can lead to data gaps. For example, data was missing from August 20 to October 9 due to power issues, and from January 1 to January 22 due to sensor problems.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 维护一致的数据收集面临的挑战包括电力供应问题和传感器故障，这可能导致数据缺失。例如，由于电力问题，8月20日至10月9日期间的数据缺失，而由于传感器问题，1月1日至1月22日期间的数据缺失。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore possible data collection methods used for capturing energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨用于捕捉绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的可能数据收集方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Observational datasets from oasis–desert systems often consist of long-term measurements of energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes. These are typically acquired using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers. Additionally, hydrometeorological data including radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, gradients of air temperature and humidity, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles are captured using automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 来自绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集通常包括能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量的长期测量。这些数据通常通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取。此外，水文气象数据包括辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面，这些数据通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期进行采集。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate the challenges that may arise during data collection in arid and semiarid inland river basins.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域进行数据收集时可能出现的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges in data collection in arid and semiarid inland river basins include ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These challenges are particularly prevalent in regions like the Tarim River basin, the Aral Sea basin, and the Lake Urmia basin.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域，数据收集面临的挑战包括生态环境退化，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些挑战在塔里木河流域、阿拉尔海流域和乌尔米湖流域等地区尤为突出。
